description: React component for admin inbox PDF preview, handling PDF data URLs, rendering inline PDF with iframe, and providing download options with error handling.

methods.name: isPdfDataUrl
methods.description: Checks if a string is a PDF data URL.

methods.name: ensurePdfPrefix
methods.description: Ensures the string has a proper PDF data URL prefix, adding base64 prefix if heuristic matches.

methods.name: base64ToUint8Array
methods.description: Converts a base64-encoded string to a Uint8Array.

methods.name: makeBlobUrlFromPdfDataUrl
methods.description: Creates a Blob URL from a PDF data URL.
